userAgent.description: Information about the eCards client extracted from the user-agent http request header

dataExchange.description: Current Data Exchange Endpoint url, see [Data Exchange](#/Data%20Exchange)

templatesSelections.description: Current Templates Selections Endpoint url, see [Templates Selections](#/Templates Selections)

serverTime.description: Server time in unix time in mili seconds.

cardId.descripion: Card identifier as displayed on a physical card as text or as scannable code

symbology.description: Symbology used to present a scannable code on the eCard

name.description: Name to be displayed on the eCard.

Projection.name: projection
Projection.description: Project fields to return from request, see https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/tutorial/project-fields-from-query-results/#projection.

AddressComponents.title: Address components
AddressComponents.description: Address components, loosely based on address_components as defined as part of the Google Places API, see https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geocoding/intro#Types.

countryCode2.description: NB: This property has no Google equivalent.

countryCode3.description: NB: This property has no Google equivalent.

streetName.description: NB: This property has no Google equivalent.

name.title: Brand Name
name.description: Brand name to be used on the eCard.

dateIssued.title: Date that the card was issued.

cardId.title: Card code
cardId.description: Card code as known to the user.

eCardTemplate.title: eCardTemplate
eCardTemplate.description: The eCard Template Schema applies to templates for eCards: digital cards, such as digital loyalty cards.

name.description: Name to be displayed on the eCard.

items.title: eCard type
items.description: Type name as defined in the Technical data model for the Templates collection: https://code.in.digital-me.nl/DEV/ecards/tree/master/mongodb#templates-collection.

[A-Za-z0-9_-]+.description: eCard templates selections for the indicated criterium.

order.description: List of eCard template object ids.

[a-z]{2}(-[A-Z]{2})?.description: Localized prompt for the indicated language.

rel.description: Indication of the type of resource.

MaxDistance.title: Maximum distance
MaxDistance.description: Maximum distance between the search location and the place.

id.description: Id as used by the source

templatesEligibility.description: Array of identifiers of templates that are relevant for the offer.

Offset.title: Offset
Offset.description: The number of items to skip in the search results.

PageSize.title: Page Size
PageSize.description: The maximum number of items to be included in the search results.

templateEligibility.description: Requested search criterium with respect to the accepted eCards.
eCard Template object id as given in the search request.

UsersServicesOffersRequestBody.description: Users Services Offers request body schema
